concept.name: coulomb [Entity] (SI base electric charge unit. It is the quantity of electric charge transported through a cross section of a conductor in an electric circuit during each SecondDuration by a current of 1 Ampere.)

attr.obj: systeme international unit (The class of Systeme International (SI) units.)
unit of electric charge (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of electric charge measure)

concept.name: yoctocoulomb [Entity] (electric charge unit equal to 0.000000000000000000000001 coulomb)

attr.obj: unit of electric charge (Every instance of this class is a unit of measure that can be used to form instances of electric charge measure)
